name: BotEscape
description:
This is made for entertainment on purpose so please don't feel offended

Story:

You are stuck in prison and you are trying to escape.

This game is made in 3 days so It's a bit rushed and expect something to be bad so we will update the game to make it better soon, right now it's just a small game

Controls:

W - Jump/ Hold W - Jump Higher

A - Left

D - Right

E/Left Click - Interact

Playable Browser Coming Soon
